descriptionHtml:
Just the wallpaper and music I use for my own Skyrim main menu! Enjoy!   
   
 
- Installation    
 Extract the .rar and place the data folder into your skyrim directory. Overwrite/ merge when asked or use NMM
 
 -Uninstallation    
 
Remove the following files from your skyrim directory.   
 

-\Skyrim\Data\meshes\interface\logo ( delete logo.nif )
-\Skyrim\Data\Textures\interface\objects ( delete mainmenuwallpaper.dds )
-\Skyrim\Data\Music\special ( delete mus_maintheme.xwm )   or uninstall using NMM  
 
 
-Credits/Permissions  
 
Vindsvept  for the amazing music used under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 allowing for non profit sharing.
 
Vindsvept's Website : http://vindsvept.com/download/  
 
Vindsvept's Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/user/Vindsvept  
 
Song: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZjoxsVV6fFo    
 
Sandara on Deviantart for the beautiful art work! (Permission given.)  
 
Find her artwork here : http://sandara.deviantart.com/
author: Ilymilarae
